columns.name: IdentityProvider
columns.description: Identity provider that authenticated the subject of the token

columns.name: ApiVersion
columns.description: The API version of the event

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: The IP address of the client from where the request was made

columns.name: ClientRequestId
columns.description: Identifier for the client request sent; if none is available, the operation identifier is used instead

columns.name: EntityType
columns.description: Type of object, such as a file, a process, a device, or a user, that made the request

columns.name: RequestUri
columns.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) of the request

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account making the request

columns.name: OperationId
columns.description: Identifier for a batch of requests; the same identifier is used for all requests in a batch but if requests are non-batched, the identifier is unique per request

columns.name: Location
columns.description: Name of the region that served the request

columns.name: RequestDuration
columns.description: Duration of the request in milliseconds

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the request was recorded

columns.name: ResponseStatusCode
columns.description: HTTP response status code for the request

columns.name: UniqueTokenIdentifier
columns.description: Unique identifier embedded in every access token and ID token that were issued
